author: jlaskowski
msg: openejb-loader-VERSION.war resurrection; use it instead of openejb-webadmin to have OpenEJB loaded per Tomcat instance. openejb-webadmin hasn't worked well, as once it was loaded no WebAdmin JSPs could be compiled. Other webapps worked fine, and so did those that used OpenEJB
